title: Looking for friendly players to duo or have fun in normal's :3
body:
Conditions you must meet -
1.   Be a positive player towards your team and others
2.   Don't be abusive towards your team or the enemy team in any way
3. Have fun and enjoy the game for what it was created for.

If you qualify for all of the conditions above feel free to add me on league >>  FLUFFY PANDAS
